usx.para: Este evangelio, segundo de los libros del NT, contiene poco material que no aparezca igualmente en Mateo y Lucas.
Many Protestants consider the following books to be Apocrypha as defined above: Tobit, Judith, additions to Esther (as found in Greek Esther in the CEV) ...

Translation it is that opens the window, to let in the light; that breaks the shell, that we may eat the kernel; that puts aside the curtain, that we may look into the most holy place; that removes the cover of the well, that we may come by the water. (“The Translators to the Reader,” King James Version, 1611).
The most important document in the history of the English language is the King James Version of the Bible...
